Translations.Text: Tamen de zhu yi ziji de ci'en, xiyue he leyuan xiang tamen baoxi, tamen jiang zai leyuan li xiangshou yongheng de enze
er yong ju qizhong. Zai an la nali que you zhongda de baochou
Xindao de renmen a! Nimen buyao yi ziji de fuxiong wei baohu ren, ruguo tamen qi zhengxin er qu mixin dehua. Nimen zhong shei yi tamen wei baohu ren, shei jiushi bu yi zhe

Ni shuo:“Ruguo nimen yiwei ziji de fuqin, erzi, xiongdi, qizi, qinqi, yiji nimen de lai de caichan, shengpa zhixiao de shengyi, he xin'ai de zhuzhai, bi an la ji qi shizhe he wei an la er fendou geng wei ke'ai, na nimen jiu dengdaizhuo, zhidao an la zhixing ta de mingling ba. An la shi bu yindao fangsi de minzhong de.”

Zai xuduo zhanchang shang he hou nai yin zhi yi, an la que yi yuanzhu nimen. Dangshi, nimen zikua ren zhong, dan renshu sui zhong, dui nimen que wu biyi; dimian sui guang, dan nimen juede wudizirong, zhongyu baibei
Houlai, an la ba ningjing jiang yu qi shizhe he xinshimen, bing jiangxia nimen suo wei jian de jundui, ta cheng zhi liao buxindao zhe, na shi bu xindao zhe de baochou
